name: Fourzy
description:
Fourzy is a board/puzzle game where the goal is to connect four or more game pieces called Fourzies. The game is played in a variety of different worlds with obstacles on the board that create ever changing gameplay. Game boards can be both procedurally generated or carefully crafted.

The experience is short, intense, logical, and each game feels like a new puzzle to unwrap and solve. An entire game can be completed in just a few minutes. Play through hundreds of levels in the puzzle adventure or play casually with friends face to face or online.
